thread.section_title: Courtyard New York Manhattan/Midtown East - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good business hotel
thread.title_full: Good business hotel - Review of Courtyard New York Manhattan/Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Debra T
title: Good business hotel
text: The Courtyard Mariott in mid-town Manhattan is a quiet, unassuming, and efficient hotel. From the quick check-in by the friendly staff to the easily (and close-by) accessed elevators, to the short trip down the hallway to my room, I was happily relaxing in no time. I can do without the fussiness of a fancy lobby or a long trek to locate elevators. Just give me a clean room (check), a spacious room (check), and a room equipped with a mini-fridge (check), and I'm a happy traveler. I will DEFINITELY come back! :-)
